creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage; part of the face of a woman with closed eyes and wet, reddish-brown skin at right; portion of an apple with a bite taken out of it at bottom enter; part of smiling man's face (wet and with reddish-brown skin) and PL hand at left in front of open refrigerator; view of a kitchen with purple cabinets with green hardware; purple blender on kitchen island right of center; black borders

title: Purple Blender
